column4: were a little lackluster in taste. I had the falafel sandwich on wheat which was delicious and very filling. They can accomodate vegans; the chap at the cash register was very knowledgable about the ingredients in all of their menu items. I especially loved to casual vibe in the restaurant
column5: which is perfectly appointed with a modernist
